posts.title: My First
posts.body: Hi, Just now I got completed this 10hrs course. I have learned a lot from this tutorial. The man who has an innocent face with a pure heart.

posts.title: My Second
posts.body: As already you said, no one can explain React JS like you.

posts.title: My Third
posts.body: Awesome tutorial. I'm new to React. I feel really effortless when I'm watching this. Thanks a lot.

posts.title: My Fourth
posts.body: Awesome Bala. I am 63 years old and am trying to learn new technologies. In fact, your explanation motivates me to watch and learn. God bless. Please continue your good work.

posts.title: My Fifth
posts.body: I saw Dave Gray's React course but didn't understand. But the same course in Tamil was very clear to understand. One of the best React courses in Tamil. Thank you, bro.

posts.title: My Fifth
